app_descript:
Moovit: Your Smart Public Transit Assistant

Brief: Moovit is an all-in-one public transport navigation app that simplifies your urban commutes. With over 930 million users across more than 3400 cities worldwide, Moovit provides reliable train and bus times, live navigation, and real-time arrival information. Enhanced with augmented reality, digital payment options, and a robust alert system, Moovit is a robust tool for planning and executing your daily travels with confidence and ease. Awarded as one of the best apps by Google Play and App Stores in 2016 and 2017, it's the ultimate app for commuters to stay informed and connected with public transit systems.
